events.name: Transition to Electromobility and LIB Development
events.wd_label: Transition to Electromobility and LIB Development
events.wd_description: As the global transport sector shifts towards electromobility, the value chain for raw materials used in lithium-ion battery (LIB) development becomes critical. This study assesses criticality aspects of LIB cells to identify supply risks and inform battery technology development.
events.description: As the global transport sector shifts towards electromobility, the value chain for raw materials used in lithium-ion battery (LIB) development becomes critical. This study assesses criticality aspects of LIB cells to identify supply risks and inform battery technology development.

events.name: Value Chain Criticality Assessment
events.wd_description: The study uses the ESSENZ method to systematically assess eleven criticality aspects of ten LIB cells, evaluating the criticality scores by aggregating the scores of eleven constituent value chains.
events.description: The study uses the ESSENZ method to systematically assess eleven criticality aspects of ten LIB cells, evaluating the criticality scores by aggregating the scores of eleven constituent value chains.

events.name: Criticality Scores Analysis
events.wd_description: The criticality scores of LIB cells are analyzed by evaluating political stability, mining capacity, trade barriers, feasibility of exploration projects, and occurrence of co-production for materials like cobalt, lithium, nickel, and graphite.
events.description: The criticality scores of LIB cells are analyzed by evaluating political stability, mining capacity, trade barriers, feasibility of exploration projects, and occurrence of co-production for materials like cobalt, lithium, nickel, and graphite.

events.name: Cobalt Analysis
events.wd_description: Cobalt dominates criticality scores in political stability, mining capacity, trade barriers, feasibility of exploration projects, and occurrence of co-production, primarily due to production concentration in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
events.description: Cobalt dominates criticality scores in political stability, mining capacity, trade barriers, feasibility of exploration projects, and occurrence of co-production, primarily due to production concentration in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

events.name: Lithium Analysis
events.wd_description: Lithium scores high in demand growth, concentration of reserves, concentration of production, and primary material use, driven by fast development of EVs and concentrated reserves in Chile and production in Australia.
events.description: Lithium scores high in demand growth, concentration of reserves, concentration of production, and primary material use, driven by fast development of EVs and concentrated reserves in Chile and production in Australia.

events.name: Nickel Analysis
events.wd_description: Nickel dominates criticality scores in price volatility and partly influences mining capacity due to its progressive demand growth and significant market fluctuations.
events.description: Nickel dominates criticality scores in price volatility and partly influences mining capacity due to its progressive demand growth and significant market fluctuations.

events.name: Graphite Analysis
events.wd_description: Graphite scores high in company concentration and political instability due to high production concentration in China and other countries with unstable governance.
events.description: Graphite scores high in company concentration and political instability due to high production concentration in China and other countries with unstable governance.

events.name: Environmental Midpoint Impacts
events.wd_description: The criticality scores are complemented by twelve environmental midpoint impacts using life cycle assessments to provide a comprehensive view of the value chain impacts.
events.description: The criticality scores are complemented by twelve environmental midpoint impacts using life cycle assessments to provide a comprehensive view of the value chain impacts.

events.name: Comparative LIB Cell Assessment
events.wd_description: The study develops a quadrant matrix chart depicting the relative performance of LIB cells based on their aggregated elemental criticality and environmental impact scores, identifying cells needing improvements.
events.description: The study develops a quadrant matrix chart depicting the relative performance of LIB cells based on their aggregated elemental criticality and environmental impact scores, identifying cells needing improvements.

events.name: Measures to Alleviate Criticality and Environmental Impacts
events.wd_label: Measures to Alleviate Criticality and Environmental Impacts
events.wd_description: Proposes measures such as the transition towards cobalt-free batteries, material efficiency improvements, and end-of-life recycling to reduce the criticality and environmental impacts of LIB cells.
events.description: Proposes measures such as the transition towards cobalt-free batteries, material efficiency improvements, and end-of-life recycling to reduce the criticality and environmental impacts of LIB cells.

events.name: Cobalt-free Batteries
events.wd_description: Transition towards using cobalt-free batteries to mitigate the high criticality associated with cobalt in LIB cells.
events.description: Transition towards using cobalt-free batteries to mitigate the high criticality associated with cobalt in LIB cells.

events.name: Material Efficiency Improvements
events.wd_description: Improve material efficiency in the production of LIB cells to reduce dependency on critical materials and lower environmental impacts.
events.description: Improve material efficiency in the production of LIB cells to reduce dependency on critical materials and lower environmental impacts.

events.name: End-of-Life Recycling
events.wd_description: Enhance end-of-life recycling processes for LIB cells to recover valuable materials and decrease overall criticality and environmental impacts.
events.description: Enhance end-of-life recycling processes for LIB cells to recover valuable materials and decrease overall criticality and environmental impacts.

events.name: High Criticality Scores for Cobalt
events.description: Cobalt dominates the criticality scores in political stability, mining capacity, trade barriers, feasibility of exploration projects, and co-production.

events.name: High Criticality Scores for Lithium
events.description: Lithium dominates the criticality scores in demand growth, concentration of reserves, concentration of production, and primary material use.

events.name: High Criticality Scores for Nickel
events.description: Nickel dominates the criticality scores in price volatility.

events.name: High Criticality Scores for Graphite
events.description: Natural graphite dominates the criticality scores in company concentration.
